CLOSE MENU







Welcome Mustangs!
Every member of Student Affairs is deeply committed to supporting students throughout their Cal Poly experience with the guidance and resources they need to succeed in a safe, welcoming and inclusive environment. The culmination of this important work helps shape globally-minded and socially-conscious leaders for our communities, our state, and our world. 
We invite you to learn more about our work, our mission, and our community of students! 
The Office of the Vice President for Student Affairs (VPSA) is open Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.
